module.name: Zulu
module.changelog: *14.0.2.8* FREEPBX-15103 Use variable for dashboard device exclusion *14.0.2.7* FREEPBX-14223 *14.0.2.6* Fix bug on user creation *14.0.2.5* Bump *14.0.2.4* Use PM2 install *14.0.23* Depend on core *14.0.2.2* Merge from 13 *14.0.2.1* Require Process Management Module *14.0.2* Merge from 13 *14.0.1alpha1* Intial Release *13.0.50.13* Let install create the directory as the asterisk user *13.0.50.12* Require newest framework *13.0.50.10* Check npm-cache install *13.0.50.3-8* Permissions checks *13.0.50.2* FREEPBX-14161 set timeout on stop. FREEPBX-14155 attempt to check access in more creative ways *13.0.50.1* FREEPBX-13914 Make installs faster (after this install) *13.0.50* Require new node library *13.0.49.12.1* Zulu doesn't screenpop (nor URLpop) on ring-group *13.0.49.12* FREEPBX-13938 fix array error *13.0.49.11* Fix reloads if route is deleted *13.0.49.10* Install even if process fails *13.0.49.9* Remove the chown command because the hooks folder permissions are set correctly *13.0.49.8* Throw exception when Asterisk manager connection dies *13.0.49.7* FREEPBX-13793 Logrotate additions *13.0.49.6* Fixed: Not writing out dialplan *13.0.49.5* FREEPBX-13757 fix starts on slow systems *13.0.49.4* FREEPBX-13712 Remove linked extension when deleted *13.0.49.3* Be more clear when Zulu Server is disabled *13.0.49.2* Fix licensing issues *13.0.49.1* Tweak to start and stop *13.0.49* Better process management *13.0.48* PHP 5.6 Updates *13.0.47.5* Automatically restart server when it crashes *13.0.47.4* Softphone creation fixes *13.0.47.3* No softphone on certain Asterisks *13.0.47.2* Cleanup *13.0.47.1* Add back in installer scripts *13.0.47* Look for new Stun Server settings in Asterisk SIP Settings *13.0.46* Use threadids for sms messages *13.0.45.4* FREEPBX-13478 uninstalling zulu module should remove all zulu extensions *13.0.45.3* Send out the right faxid... *13.0.45.2* Send out faxid to the client when sending a fax *13.0.45.1* Require newest framework *13.0.45* Support new client infrastructure *13.0.44* FREEPBX-12489 Zulu download from UCP System Adimin tab *13.0.43* Support backlogged messages when clients are offline *13.0.42* More verbose error reporting on database connect failures *13.0.41* FREEPBX-12018 Properly remove queues when they are deleted *13.0.40* Fix broken reloads when inbound routes are deleted *13.0.39* Auto-Answer calls originated from Zulu (Option to turn off in GUI) *13.0.38* FREEPBX-11739 pull replacements from Leg A of call not Leg B *13.0.37* FREEPBX-11682 FREEPBX-11684 *13.0.36* Remove en_US Translations *13.0.35* Support ringgroups for Popups *13.0.34* Fix issues with FREEPBX-11650, allow ring group and hunt group explicit definitions *13.0.33* Missing brackets *13.0.32* FREEPBX-11674 cant apply changes after queue deleted, FREEPBX-11650 evaluate strings from direct extensions *13.0.31* Add commercial tags to module.xml *13.0.30* More FREEPBX-11539 *13.0.29* Move to the right repo *13.0.28* FREEPBX-11539 Deleting inbound route breaks reload *13.0.27* Run dir permission fixes *13.0.26* Reverse the input *13.0.25* Dont attempt to start if not licensed *13.0.24* Cleanup workarounds and useless code *13.0.23* Fix url type *13.0.21* User Manager assigning issue *13.0.20* More debugging *13.0.19* Libs have to exist to be able to stop before start in install *13.0.18* Make sure null is blank for javascripting *13.0.17* Fix setting null as the presence message *13.0.16* Fixes *13.0.15* Cleanup *13.0.14* Address starting and stopping issues through GUI *13.0.13* Try stopping earlier, before updating *13.0.12* Finishing touches on extension pops *13.0.11* Call pops for extensions *13.0.10* Move Zulu call lower for get starting IDs *13.0.9* ZULU-15 Allow setting defaults per extension *13.0.8* ZULU-51 Call notification from Outbound Callee *13.0.7* ZULU-48 which fixes an issue with the licensing hook *13.0.6* Presence in Asterisk 11 *13.0.5* Undefined errors among other things *13.0.4* Tweaks to processor and Asterisk 11 issues *13.0.3* Stop all no matter what *13.0.2* Public Preview *13.0.1* Internal Release
module.description: Zulu bridges the gap between your PBX and your desktop. Providing unified communications directly in the applications you use daily
